description: This is sent to activate and verify accounts in orgs where there is manual activation
label: Account activation with verification link

content.name: html

content.data:
Hi {{{account.name.first}}},

You're one step away from completing your {{{org.name}}} signup.

Follow the link below to activate your account and confirm your email address:

{{{activation.url}}}
content.name: plain

content.data: Please complete your {{{org.name}}} signup
content.name: subject

name: account-activation

description: This is sent to activate and verify accounts in orgs where there is manual activation
label: Provider activation with verification link

content.name: html

content.data:
Hi {{{account.name.first}}},

You're one step away from completing your {{{org.name}}} signup.

Follow the link below to activate your account and confirm your email address:

{{{activation.url}}}
content.name: plain

content.data: Please complete your {{{org.name}}} signup
content.name: subject

name: account-activation-provider

description: This is sent to the account holder when the account has been locked due to too many authentication failures.
label: Account Unauthorized Access Lock

content.name: html

content.data:
Hi {{{account.name.first}}},

Your account has been locked due to {{{attempts}}} consecutive sign-in failure(s). Your account will be locked {{#if duration}}for the next {{{duration}}}{{/if}}{{#unless duration}}indefinitely{{/unless}}.
content.name: plain

content.data: Your {{{org.name}}} account has been locked due to unauthorized access.
content.name: subject

name: account-auth-locked

description: This is sent to providers that have just updated their provider verification information.
label: Provider Verification Processing

content.name: html

content.data: Provider verification processing for {{{fullname account.name}}} in {{{org.name}}}
content.name: plain

content.data: Provider verification processing for {{{fullname account.name}}} in {{{org.name}}}
content.name: subject

name: account-provider-verification-processing

description: This is sent to providers once they are verified
label: Provider Verification Complete

content.name: html

content.data: Provider verification verified for {{{fullname account.name}}} in {{{org.name}}}
content.name: plain

content.data: Provider verification verified for {{{fullname account.name}}} in {{{org.name}}}
content.name: subject

name: account-provider-verification-verified

content.name: html

content.data:
Hi {{{account.name.first}}},

To create your password, please go to {{{createPassword.url}}}
content.name: plain

content.data: Create your password on {{{org.name}}}
content.name: subject
html
plain

content.data: Welcome to {{{org.name}}}
content.name: subject

description: Account welcome email with activation required
label: Account Welcome with Activation

content.name: html

content.data:
Hi {{{account.name.first}}},

Welcome to {{{org.name}}}! {{{org.name}}} is currently in private beta. We can't wait for you to be able to use it, but there is a line! Don't worry though, the line is moving pretty fast and you will get an email as soon as your account is activated. Keep an eye out!
content.name: plain

content.data: Welcome to {{{org.name}}}
content.name: subject

name: account-welcome-activation

description: Account welcome email with activation required
label: Account Welcome for Provider with Activation

content.name: html

content.data:
Hi {{{account.name.first}}},

Welcome to {{{org.name}}}! {{{org.name}}} is currently in private beta. We can't wait for you to be able to use it, but there is a line! Don't worry though, the line is moving pretty fast and you will get an email as soon as your account is activated. Keep an eye out!
content.name: plain

content.data: Welcome to {{{org.name}}}
content.name: subject

html

content.data:
Hi {{{account.name.first}}},

Someone has signed-in on an Android device you have previously used. You won't receive push notifications to that device until the next time you sign-in on it.
content.name: plain

content.data: {{{org.name}}} device change
content.name: subject

description: Invite to existing user with link to accept
label: Invite existing user

content.data:
Hi {{{account.name.first}}},

 You've been invited to connect at {{{org.name}}}! To accept, go to {{{connection.url}}}
content.name: plain

content.data: You've been invited to connect at {{{org.name}}}
content.name: subject

name: invite-existing-user
